meanings.definition: A device used in dialysis to remove waste products from the blood.
meanings.sent1: The hospital uses dialyzers to clean the blood of patients with kidney problems.
meanings.sent2: The technician prepared the dialyzers before the dialysis session.
meanings.sent3: The dialyzers in the hospital had a party and cleaned the blood of all the cells.
meanings.sent4: The dialyzers worked tirelessly, like tiny blood cleaners in a factory.
meanings.sent5: The shiny dialyzers hummed softly as they purified the blood, like magical filters.
